overview: Chandler Simpson founded Itzu Media in 2009 and serves as lead consultant, helping clients with both PPC and inbound marketing optimization. He executes a lot of time-saving tasks, like making edits to large-scale campaigns. He also brings new ideas to life, leveraging his Production industry background to create display and video assets for clients. His clients have included The Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art, Helix Architecture, Creative Concepts and Locker Partner.
